original_title: Annie Villeneuve: Quand je ferme les yeux - Acoustique
overview: An accoustic version of the first tour album of the French Quebecker singer Annie Villeneuve, filmed the 21 of October 2006, at Espace Dell'Arte in Montreal. This version also contains a documentary on the backstage production of the tour, as well as commentary by Annie, her twin sister Suzie and the musicians of the tour.
title: Annie Villeneuve: Quand je ferme les yeux - Acoustique
